HydroCalc is a simple application that helps you calculate your daily water intake needs based on personal data such as body weight and physical activity. With a lightweight and user-friendly interface, HydroCalc is designed to raise awareness about the importance of hydration for overall health.\n\nThis app was developed as part of a mini project for the Mobile Programming 1 course.

Here are some tips to keep your body healthy and hydrated:
Drink at least 8 glasses of water a day.
Consume fruits and vegetables rich in water, such as watermelon, cucumber, and oranges.
Reduce caffeinated and alcoholic beverages that can cause dehydration.
Pay attention to urine color: clear urine indicates proper hydration.
Drink water regularly, don’t wait until you’re thirsty.
Use a water intake calculator app like HydroCalc.
Stay healthy and maintain your daily hydration needs!
